amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used for domestic partnership benefits in the District of Columbia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to implement or enforce the Health Care Benefits Expansion Act of 1992.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goode amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 200 (Roll no. 603).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Goode.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
